title: TidyTuesday
text:
TidyTuesday is a weekly, social data science project. I use it a chance to explore new and fun ways of doing data visualization using ggplot2.

title: Hugo Åkerstrand
text:
Welcome!
I am Hugo, a life science researcher and R programmer. I hold a PhD in developmental immunology from Lund Stem Cell Center, Sweden. I combine a strong understanding of wet lab science with a passion for R programming.
I use my bilingual skill set to develop tools, explore data, and generate visualization that lie close to the needs and expectations of life science researchers.
Learn more about my approach to R progamming over on my blog, explore my data visualization under TidyTuesday contributions, or read up on my R package for flow cytometry analysis.
